# MacPass

## MacOS login screen for iOS!

### MacPass is confirmed to work on iOS 13 & 14.

### This does not provide a passcode for checkra1n devices with SEP disabled.

### Join my Discord today to report any issues: https://discord.gg/64kVRNzKnF

### Source Code
https://github.com/nahtedetihw/MacPass

### Follow

* [ETHN](https://twitter.com/ethanwhited) - follow me for more up to date info, or ask me anything.

* [Email](mailto:ethanwhited2208@gmail.com) - open to any questions or concerns.

* [Repo](https://nahtedetihw.github.io) - Repo containing MacPass

#### Version 1.3

* Fixed a crash for users on iOS 13.

#### Version 1.2

* Fixed issues with Auto Unlock
* Added an option to remove ProfilePicture
* Added an option to adjust the blur opacity of the blur on the background
* Added an option to define the number of chracters in your passcode to prevent disabling.

#### Version 1.1

* Fixed issues with Auto Unlock and separated the option for Auto Unlock with FaceID.
Fixed visual issues when using alphanumeric passcode.
